page.title: 20HOLMESFIELD-SURVEY CONCLUDED
page.content: Our Domesday Project has come to an end, Information of a beautiful scene we now send. Valleys and hills stretch for mile upon mile, An unspoilt landscape our minds to beguile. {We acknowledge the help of the {following people.} Mr.& Mrs. Biggins of Cordwell Farm. Mr. Hill of Barlow Hunt. Mr. Morgan of Holmesfield. Mr. North .Holmesfield Parish Council. Mr. Porter of Severn Trent Water. Rev. R. Rivers vicar of Holmesfield. Mr. Sanderson Headteacher Penny Acres. Miss. K. Wilkinson of Lidgate. Mr. & Mrs. Wills of The Royal Oak. Miss. Wilson of Horsleygate Hall. The children, Mr.Hickling, Mr.Keeling and Mr.Beardsell of Wm.Levick School.
